title: HP Smart Tank 530 All-in-one WiFi Colour Printer with ADF (Upto 18000 Black and 8000 Colour Pages Included in The Box). - Print, Scan & Copy for Office/Home
description: HP Smart Tank 530 All-in-one WiFi Colour Printer with ADF (Upto 18000 Black and 8000 Colour Pages Included in The Box). - Print, Scan & Copy for Office/Home
features:
• 【All-in-One printer】Streamline your workflow with this all-in-one - print, copy, scan HP Smart Tank printer that elevates your projects with stunning color prints and dependable flatbed scanning.
  • 【Seamless connectivity】Minimize hassles by relying on swift connections with dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth LE, and Hi-Speed USB 2.0 for smooth, reliable, and efficient printing.
  • 【Quality prints】The included HP GT53XL 135-ml Black Original Ink Bottle and HP GT52 Cyan/Magenta/Yellow Original Ink Bottle ensure that your photos and documents always stand out.
  • 【Warranty and support】Get 1-year or 30,000-page limited hardware warranty and print with ultimate peace of mind. Reach out to our 12x7 voice support or 24x7 chat support for quick assistance.
  • 【Fast printing】Maximize your productivity with remarkable printing speeds up to 11 ppm (black) and 5 ppm (color) and stay ahead of your workload with 35-sheet automatic document feeder.
  • 【Input and output】Say goodbye to limitations by tackling your printing tasks with A4, B5, A6, and DL envelope standard media size compatibility, up to 100-sheet input and 30-sheet output capacity
  • 【Easy-to-use interface】Simplify jobs and save your time with a 2.2-inch touchscreen MGD (mono graphics), power button, and touch button (Home, Help, Back).

reviews.comment: We've been using it since a couple of months. No issues so far. Works smoothly, overall a good printer.
reviews.name: Leena

reviews.comment: Highly recommended to have one.
reviews.name: Satheesh Kumar

reviews.comment: but some time i face the many problem for connect this printer to wifi. wifi is working good but first use with wifi it have many struggle
reviews.name: Rock Star

reviews.comment: It's a good printer at this price point... However it's not a wifi printer as everyone might think by hearing the name, 'smart' I got very disappointed as soon as I found out it's not wifi...
reviews.name: Ryan

title: HP Smart Tank 529 AIO Colour Printer (Upto 6000 Black & 6000 Colour Pages Included in The Box)- Print, Scan & Copy for Office/Home
description: HP Smart Tank 529 AIO Colour Printer (Upto 6000 Black & 6000 Colour Pages Included in The Box)- Print, Scan & Copy for Office/Home
features:
• 【All-in-One printer】Enjoy the convenience of an all-in-one printer ideal for home and home office use, offering printing, scanning, and copying functions along with a flatbed scanner.
  • 【Seamless connectivity】Enjoy easy, reliable, and hassle-free connection via Hi-Speed USB 2.0, ensuring a smooth, efficient printing experience.
  • 【Quality prints】Print with excellent quality using HP GT53 90-ml/ HP GT53XL 135-ml Black Original Ink Bottle and HP GT52 Cyan/Magenta/Yellow Original Ink Bottle.
  • 【Warranty and support】Invest in peace of mind with a 1-year warranty. Reach out to our 12x7 voice support or 24x7 chat support for quick assistance.
  • 【Fast printing】Experience fast printing with speeds up to 12 ppm (black) and 5 ppm (color), ideal for high-volume printing tasks.
  • 【Input and output】Handle various paper sizes efficiently with a 100-sheet input tray and a 30-sheet output tray. Supports A4, B5, A6, DL envelope, and legal standard media sizes.
  • 【Easy-to-use interface】Navigate effortlessly with a 27 Segments + 1.0-inch Icon LCD display and user-friendly buttons (Power On/Off, Cancel, Resume, Color copy, Black copy, and ID copy).

reviews.comment: This printer works perfectly for home usage. Print quality is good for both mono and color printing.
reviews.name: Loganathan T

reviews.comment: It's a good printer at this price point... However it's not a wifi printer as everyone might think by hearing the name, 'smart' I got very disappointed as soon as I found out it's not wifi...

In office, you can print your instant idea or schedual immediately, record those important things or classfy items with different lables or stickers. In home, you can use it to classfy various item, food containter, item marker, etc.
  • STYLISH CARTOON BLUETOOTH PRINTER: Our bluetooth thermal printer is USB charing, built in 1200mAh battery, can be powered by powerbank or connecting any adapter. Perfect for labeling file folders, food storage, organizing clothes, food containters, jars, bottles, etc. Cute cartoon design of also adds a touch stylish to this printer, making it a nice gift for students, kids, and anyone who values the functionality and fashion.

  • 203dpi Clear Printing : Seznik Mini Sticker Printer has a cute look and a small size. More importantly, compared with similar mini printer, it has clear printing and high-definition imaging.
  • Supports A Variety Of Functions: Can Print Photos, Labels, Information, Lists, Records, Qr Codes, Web Page Printing, OCR Text Recognition Etc. The App Provides A Variety Of Fonts And Themes To Make Your Printing More Convenient And Stylish.
  • Package Includes: 1 mini printer, 1 Thermal Paper roll (inside the printer), 1 USB charging cable, 1 instruction manual.

features:

title: HP Smart Tank 529 AIO Colour Printer (Upto 6000 Black & 6000 Colour Pages Included in The Box)- Print, Scan & Copy for Office/Home
description: HP Smart Tank 529 AIO Colour Printer (Upto 6000 Black & 6000 Colour Pages Included in The Box)- Print, Scan & Copy for Office/Home
features:
• 【All-in-One printer】Enjoy the convenience of an all-in-one printer ideal for home and home office use, offering printing, scanning, and copying functions along with a flatbed scanner.
  • 【Seamless connectivity】Enjoy easy, reliable, and hassle-free connection via Hi-Speed USB 2.0, ensuring a smooth, efficient printing experience.
  • 【Quality prints】Print with excellent quality using HP GT53 90-ml/ HP GT53XL 135-ml Black Original Ink Bottle and HP GT52 Cyan/Magenta/Yellow Original Ink Bottle.
  • 【Warranty and support】Invest in peace of mind with a 1-year warranty. Reach out to our 12x7 voice support or 24x7 chat support for quick assistance.
  • 【Fast printing】Experience fast printing with speeds up to 12 ppm (black) and 5 ppm (color), ideal for high-volume printing tasks.
  • 【Input and output】Handle various paper sizes efficiently with a 100-sheet input tray and a 30-sheet output tray. Supports A4, B5, A6, DL envelope, and legal standard media sizes.
  • 【Easy-to-use interface】Navigate effortlessly with a 27 Segments + 1.0-inch Icon LCD display and user-friendly buttons (Power On/Off, Cancel, Resume, Color copy, Black copy, and ID copy).

features:

title: Astrill T02 Sticker Printer- Inkless Printer Small poratable Printer (Printer, Plum)
description: Astrill T02 Sticker Printer- Inkless Printer Small poratable Printer (Printer, Plum)
features:
• Mini Printer- Portable & Versatile Thermal Printer. T02 mini printer is a compact and versatile inkless printer. It's perfect for students and creative individuals who need to print photos, texts, or stickers on-the-go. Its mini design ensures easy portability, making it an ideal pocket-sized thermal printer.
  • Inkless Printing- T02 inkless printer utilizes thermal technology to deliver clear prints without the need for messy ink cartridges. Enjoy effortless printing of study materials and creative designs with this inkless thermal printer. Say goodbye to bulky printers and embrace the simplicity of inkless printing.
  • Sticker Printer & Maker- With T02 sticker printer, unleash your creativity with ease. Print a variety of sticker designs and add a personal touch to your belongings. Whether you're a student or a DIY enthusiast, this compact thermal sticker printer is perfect for sticker printing and sticker making.
  • Versatile Thermal Printer- Upgrade your printing experience with T02 note printer. A compact inkless printer that offers versatility and unparalleled portability. With its thermal printing technology, you can easily print photos, texts, and various sticker designs. Discover the power of thermal printing and enjoy a new level of convenience!

title: Canon PIXMA MegaTank G3770 Red All-in-one (Print, Scan, Copy) WiFi Inktank Colour Printer (Black 6000 Prints & Colour 7700 Prints) for Office,Scan The QR Code & Get a JBL Speaker Free on Registration
description: Canon PIXMA MegaTank G3770 Red All-in-one (Print, Scan, Copy) WiFi Inktank Colour Printer (Black 6000 Prints & Colour 7700 Prints) for Office,Scan The QR Code & Get a JBL Speaker Free on Registration
features:
• Printer type: Inkjet ; Functions: Print, Scan, Copy ; Printer output: Colour ; Connectivity: Wi-Fi, AirPrint, Mopria, Direct Wireless, USB 2.0 ; Scanner: Yes ; Scanner resolution:600 x 1200dpi
  • OS Compatibility: Windows 11 / 10 / 8.1 / 7 SP1 (operation can only be guaranteed on a PC with a pre-installed Windows 7 or later), macOS 10.14.6 – 12 or later, Chrome OS; Mobile connectivity : Yes (via Canon Print Service, PIXMA Cloud Link, Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY); Hardware Interface: USB 2.0 ; Enlarge/reduce option: No ; Duplex: No
  • Maximum Print Speed: 11/6 (mono/color) images per minutePrint cost Monochrome: Rs 0.13 ; Print cost color: Rs 0.25 ; Maximum Print Resolution: 4800 x 1200 dpi
  • Page size: A4, A5, A6, B5, LTR, LGL, Executive, Oficio2,B-Oficio, M-Oficio, Legal (India), Foolscap, F4,4 x 6", 5 x 7", 7 x 10", 8 x 10", Envelopes , Square, Card Size ,Custom Size- Width: 55 - 216 mm, Length: 89 - 1,200 mm; Max paper thickness: 64 to 275 GSM ; Maximum Input Sheet Capacity: 100 sheets (A4); Compatible ink:GI 71 Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Black; Additional Printer Function: Print modes- Standard and Economy ; Power wattage of printer: OFF: 0.1W, Standby (scanning lamp is off):0.6W, Copying (USB connection to PC): 15W
  • Special Features: Borderless Print, 1.3 inch display (Monochrome)with backlight; Ideal Usage: Home, Home Office; Included Components: Printer, Power Cord, USB cable, Instruction Manual, 1 set of GI71 Cyan, Magenta, Yellow and Black ink bottles
  • Page Yield: GI71 BK- 6000 prints, GI71 Cyan, Magenta, Yellow- 7700 prints as per ISO/IEC 24711 (for A4 size) using ISO/IEC 24712 test file.
  • Onsite Warranty - 1 year or 30,000 prints (whichever is earlier) from the date of purchase.Use only genuine Canon ink. Using counterfeit ink will harm your printer as well as render the warranty void
